meta-tags.description: My name is JuliÃ¡n Varo, I am a web developer based in Spain.

home.phrase: I love building beautiful applications that generate value for the people.

about.paragraph-1: My first steps in coding were in high school, solving some exercises. Although I was interested in the subject and I was curious to learn more, I set it aside because I was mainly focused on playing football (soccer) and learning about sports.
about.paragraph-2: In 2021 I returned to programming to find what I couldn't have seen before. After some searches and investigations, web development got my attention and I decided to go deeper.
about.paragraph-3: I learned through different resources from web and building projects. Now, I am exploring and improving my skills to develop a better software and give a better experience to the user.
